mapper.select: select r.accession, (case when c.public_root=1 then CONCAT("ftp://download.big.ac.cn/","gsa/",c.accession,"/",r.accession) when c.public_root=2 then CONCAT("ftp://download.big.ac.cn/","gsa2/",c.accession,"/",r.accession) when c.public_root=3 then CONCAT("ftp://download.big.ac.cn/","gsa3/",c.accession,"/",r.accession) end) as ftpUrl from run r left join cra c on c.cra_id=r.cra_id and c.status=3 and c.release_state=2 where r.accession=#{accession} and r.status=10 and r.release_state=2
select rdf.archived_file_name,rdf.md5 from run r,run_data_file rdf where rdf.run_id=r.run_id and r.accession=#{accession}
select c.accession from cra c where c.release_state = 2 AND c.status = 3 AND (c.is_controlled is null or c.is_controlled!=1) ORDER by c.release_time desc
